name: Alcohol (Nemesis Games) (Nemesis Games)
description:
ALCOHOL

alcohol

/ˈalkəhɒl/

a toxic and psychoactive substance with dependence producing properties.

Every year 3 million people die from harmful use of alcohol. That is 5.3%  of all deaths. Why is alcohol so addictive?

Alcohol slows the communication in brain, making it feel relaxed. It also releases substances responsible for pleasure, making it harder to quit. 

Play ALCOHOL to stay alert.
